articles.title: Drunk Man Urinates On Woman In New York-Delhi Air India Flight - NDTV
articles.description: A drunk man urinated on a woman co-passenger in the business class of an Air India flight in November and left without facing any action. Weeks after the incident, Air India has recommended that the unruly flier be placed on the no-fly list.
articles.content:
The airline acted after the woman wrote to Tata Group chairman N Chandrasekaran.
